Package org.perfidix.socketadapter

This class offers all possibilties to hand on a Perclipse Plugin.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IBenchRunSessionListener This interface specifies the methods which have to update the eclipse view when a given event occurs.
IUpdater This class creates the connection to the eclipse view via SocketViewStub.
 

Class Summary
SocketAdapter The SocketAdapter is the main-class for registration of the classes that will be benched and creation of the socket stub to the ide view.
SocketListener Listener for Perclipse
SocketViewProgressUpdater This class creates the connection to the eclipse view via SocketViewStub.
SocketViewStub This class creates the connection to the eclipse view, which depict the current progress of the operation.
 

Package org.perfidix.socketadapter Description

This class offers all possibilties to hand on a Perclipse Plugin. This includes on the one hand an adapter including a listener for getting the newest results and on the other hand a connection over a socket to the plugin.
